item.title: Linear Algebra
item.description: Setup R Python Scalar Multiplication R Rcpp Python Matrix-Vector Multiplication R Rcpp Python Vector-Matrix Multiplication R Rcpp Python Matrix-Matrix Multiplication R Rcpp Python Environment This post was last updated on 2018-12-03. item.title: Mode
item.description: What is it? R Base R Rcpp Blueprint Templated Python Pure Python NumPy Numba Parallel CuPy Shootout Environment This post was last updated on 2018-11-30. What is it? Given a sequence, the mode is the value with the highest number of occurrences. Steps find the unique values count the number of occurrences of each value the mode is the value with the highest number of occurrences R Base R r_mode <- function(x) { uniques <- x[!

item.title: Variance and Standard Deviation
item.description: What is it? Variance Translation Standard Deviation Translation R Base R Rcpp Sugar RcppArmadillo Custom Template Python Pure Python NumPy CuPy Shootout Environment This post was last updated on 2018-12-02. What is it? Variance \[Var(x) = \sigma^2 = \frac{\sum(x_i - \mu_x)^2} {N-1}\] or… \[Var(x) = s^2 = \frac{\sum(x_i - \bar{x})^2} {n-1}\] \(x_i\): for each i in x \(\mu_x\) and \(\bar{x}\): arithmetic mean of the values in \(x\) \(N\) and \(n\): number of observations in \(x\) \(\sum\): sum Translation \[\textbf{variance} ~←~ \frac{\textbf{sum}(~(~\textbf{for}~i~\textbf{in}~x: i -\textbf{mean}(x)~)^2~)} {\textbf{length}(x) - 1}\]
